focusedAbilities.desc: At the start and end of your turn, you perform one Gunslinger Action of your choice without paying its cost, from among those available to you in your current Stance.
focusedAbilities.trigger: at the start and end of your turn

fusedAbilities.desc: At the start -or- end of your turn, you perform one Gunslinger Action of your choice without paying its cost, from among those available to you in your current Stance.
fusedAbilities.trigger: at the start -or- end of your turn

franticAbilities.desc: At the start and end of this turn, you perform one Gunslinger Action of your choice without paying its cost, from among those available to you in your current Stance.
franticAbilities.trigger: at the start and end of this turn

actions.name: Grape Shot
actions.desc:
This is a Gunslinger Action.
Deal 1 damage to up to four enemies within range. Any target that takes 0 damage from Grape Shot is pushed 1 space.

actions.name: Slug Shot
actions.desc:
This is a Gunslinger Action.
Push 4 and deal 2 damage to an enemy within range.

alphaSuper.name: Sniping Point
alphaSuper.desc: Your maximum range is infinite, until the end of this Round. Then, deal 7 damage to an enemy within range.

deltaSuper.name: Bullet Time
deltaSuper.desc: Choose an enemy within range. Deal 1 damage to that enemy and all adjacent enemies, then deal 1 damage to that enemy and all adjacent enemies, then deal 1 damage to that enemy and all adjacent enemies, then deal 1 damage to that enemy and all adjacent enemies, then deal 1 damage to that enemy and all adjacent enemies.
